thread.section_title: Cherry Tree Design Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cherry Tree Design | cherrytreedesign.com
thread.title: Brenda Bennett
thread.title_full: Cherry Tree Design reviewed by Brenda Bennett

author: Brenda Bennett
title: Brenda Bennett
text: My door set arrived with no damage beautifully crafted. Customer service was excellent every time I callled with questions. I did a lot of research on Shoji doors and found Cherrytree the best in quality and value. My only issue is what to do with the crate it came in, my contractor took it away to cut up and dispose. Would like to see it recycled.
